function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Nosocomial transmission of SARS-CoV-2 due to environmental contamination","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of the virus within the healthcare facility","Mitigation":"Enhanced cleaning protocols, proper use of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies, air and surface sterilization systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Uncertain mode of transmission and extent of environmental contamination","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing effective control measures","Mitigation":"Further research to understand transmission routes and contamination levels","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, real-time detection and monitoring technologies","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Use of specific cleaning chemicals in routine cleaning","Impact":"Potential risk of chemical exposure and toxicity","Mitigation":"Proper training of cleaning staff, use of safety equipment, alternative safer cleaning agents","Technologies":"Chemical safety monitoring devices, protective equipment for staff","People":"Cleaning staff, healthcare workers","Owner":"Facility management, environmental health and safety authorities"}]}
